TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StylusButton extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a button on a stylus.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following checks whether the user pressed the barrel button on a stylus.
[!code-vb[StylusSnippets#24](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/StylusSnippets_VB/Window1.xaml.vb#24)] [!code-cs[StylusSnippets#24](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/StylusSnippets_CS/Window1.xaml.cs#24)]

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Guid"> that represents the stylus button.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Guid"> property that represents the stylus button.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The value of this property is guaranteed to be unique among stylus buttons on the system.
## Examples The following checks whether the user pressed the barrel button on a stylus.
[!code-vb[StylusSnippets#24](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/StylusSnippets_VB/Window1.xaml.vb#24)] [!code-cs[StylusSnippets#24](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/StylusSnippets_CS/Window1.xaml.cs#24)]

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the stylus button.
Docs.value: The name of the stylus button.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates the Name property.
[!code-vb[StylusSnippets#25](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/StylusSnippets_VB/Window1.xaml.vb#25)] [!code-cs[StylusSnippets#25](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/StylusSnippets_CS/Window1.xaml.cs#25)]

Docs.summary: Gets the state of the stylus button.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates the StylusButtonState property.

Docs.summary: Gets the stylus that this button belongs to.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> that represents the stylus of the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusButton>.

remarks.format:
